original_title: Sally Mae: The Revenge Of The Twin Dragons
overview: Sally Mae is on the run. She has lost almost everyone she knows: her family, her friends...she no longer has anything or anyone. A bounty is put on her following the murder of two members of the Blackground family. Pursued by corrupt police officers and L.A. gangs, she will have to develop new skills i order to face those who hide behind it all: the mysterious Twin Dragons.
title: Sally Mae: The Revenge Of The Twin Dragons
